name: Legend of Rofnez
description:
Legend of Rofnez is a top down point and click action RPG videogame where you incarnate the skin of Rofnez, a self proclaimed hero who's on a mission to defeat the Evil King.

This game was made as university project and his state will remain as a prototype until we decided to continue it or not. The game contains three playable levels filled of enemies, traps and items for the player to use.

Legend of Rofnez was developed in Unity.

Staff:

- Calogero Santiago: 3D/VFX Artist

- Monti Sol: Level/Game Designer

- Slobodianik Esteban Joel (Myself): Lead Designer - Game Dev
